name: Weirdtown
description:
Meet some peculiar locals and enjoy vivid text-based scenery in Weirdtown! This cozy 8x8 grid has over five minutes* worth of content to explore and seems to look a little different each time you visit. There will be goofy antics and silly shenanigans for all in Weirdtown!

*While discovering all of the semi-random occurrences should take at least five minutes, I can't guarantee that it will stay fun for that long.
